name: ISSNValidator_convertToEAN13Test
description: Unit tests for the convertToEAN13 method in the ISSNValidator class.

test_cases.name: testConvertToEAN13Valid
test_cases.description: Tests the convertToEAN13 method with a valid ISSN and suffix, expecting a correct EAN13 conversion.

test_cases.name: testConvertToEAN13InvalidSuffix
test_cases.description: Tests the convertToEAN13 method with an invalid suffix, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testConvertToEAN13InvalidISSN
test_cases.description: Tests the convertToEAN13 method with an invalid ISSN, expecting a null result.

test_cases.name: testConvertToEAN13CheckDigitException
test_cases.description: Tests the convertToEAN13 method with an invalid EAN13 prefix, expecting a correct EAN13 conversion.
